short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds daily workouts to your new tab page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your new tab page will remind you to do your daily home workout. You can create a weekly workout schedule with different exercises and select a handicap according to your current fitness level. Over time, the extension will increase the intensity of your training with every successful day until you reach the goals you've defined in your plan.
